introduction: 张玲退休四年才想到“抱团养老”，别墅里几个合租的退休老人开始搭伴生活，但是她没想到这件事情并不像想象得那么顺利。有人想为老年的爱情画上句号，执迷于为老伴做一个 “粉色烟火”，也有人在对亲人的怀念中难以释怀，也有人捡起了绘画的爱好。消逝的是时间，留住的是生命的温度。Zhang Ling, who loves painting, thought of "supporting the elderly in a group" after four years into retirement. Therefore, in her villa, several retired people rented the house and live together. Some tenant, obsessed with making a "pink firework" for his wife, wants to create a beautiful ending for his love romance. Others are reluctant to let go of the memory of their loved ones, and some have picked up the hobby of painting. What is lost is time, what is retained is the love of life.
